mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE , 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS ORDER_DATE , O.QUANTITY , O.MEMBER_NO, P.NAME, S.DELIVERY_STATUS , O.DEL_YN, P.IMAGE FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO JOIN DELIVERY D ON D.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS S ON S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = D.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND O.DEL_YN = 'N'
